metadata.description: Public Ip address for source in NSG.

osProfile.customData:
[base64(concat(
'#cloud-config
',
'
',
'package_update: true
',
'package_upgrade: true
',
'
',
'packages:
',
'  - apache2
',
'  - easy-rsa
',
'  - zip
',
'  - unzip
',
'  - wget
',
'  - curl
',
'
',
'write_files:
',
'
',
'  - path: /opt/ca-lab/scripts/init-pki.sh
',
'    permissions: "0755"
',
'    content: |
',
'      #!/usr/bin/env bash
',
'      set -euo pipefail
',
'
',
'      EASYRSA_BIN="$(command -v easyrsa || true)"
',
'      if [[ -z "$EASYRSA_BIN" && -x /usr/share/easy-rsa/easyrsa ]]; then
',
'        EASYRSA_BIN="/usr/share/easy-rsa/easyrsa"
',
'      fi
',
'      [[ -z "$EASYRSA_BIN" ]] && echo "easyrsa not found" && exit 127
',
'
',
'      BASE="/opt/ca-lab/pki"
',
'      ROOT="$BASE/root"
',
'      INT="$BASE/intermediate"
',
'
',
'      ROOT_CN="${1:-Lab Root CA}"
',
'      INT_CN="${2:-Lab Intermediate CA}"
',
'      COUNTRY="${3:-CR}"
',
'      PROVINCE="${4:-SanJose}"
',
'      CITY="${5:-Lab}"
',
'      ORG="${6:-LabCA}"
',
'      OU="${7:-IT}"
',
'      EMAIL="${8:-admin@example.local}"
',
'
',
'      [[ -f "$ROOT/pki/ca.crt" ]] && exit 0
',
'
',
'      mkdir -p "$ROOT" "$INT"
',
'
',
'      write_vars() {
',
'        cat > "$1/vars" <<EOF
',
'      set_var EASYRSA_REQ_COUNTRY "$COUNTRY"
',
'      set_var EASYRSA_REQ_PROVINCE "$PROVINCE"
',
'      set_var EASYRSA_REQ_CITY "$CITY"
',
'      set_var EASYRSA_REQ_ORG "$ORG"
',
'      set_var EASYRSA_REQ_EMAIL "$EMAIL"
',
'      set_var EASYRSA_REQ_OU "$OU"
',
'      set_var EASYRSA_ALGO ec
',
'      set_var EASYRSA_DIGEST sha512
',
'      EOF
',
'      }
',
'
',
'      export EASYRSA_BATCH=1
',
'
',
'      cd "$ROOT"
',
'      write_vars "$ROOT"
',
'      "$EASYRSA_BIN" init-pki
',
'      EASYRSA_REQ_CN="$ROOT_CN" "$EASYRSA_BIN" build-ca nopass
',
'
',
'      cd "$INT"
',
'      write_vars "$INT"
',
'      "$EASYRSA_BIN" init-pki
',
'      EASYRSA_REQ_CN="$INT_CN" "$EASYRSA_BIN" gen-req ca nopass
',
'
',
'      cd "$ROOT"
',
'      "$EASYRSA_BIN" import-req "$INT/pki/reqs/ca.req" intermediate
',
'      "$EASYRSA_BIN" sign-req ca intermediate
',
'
',
'      cp "$ROOT/pki/issued/intermediate.crt" "$INT/pki/ca.crt"
',
'      cp "$ROOT/pki/ca.crt" "$INT/pki/root-ca.crt"
',
'      cat "$INT/pki/ca.crt" "$INT/pki/root-ca.crt" > "$INT/pki/ca-chain.crt"
',
'
',
'  - path: /opt/ca-lab/scripts/issue-cert.sh
',
'    permissions: "0755"
',
'    content: |
',
'      #!/usr/bin/env bash
',
'      set -euo pipefail
',
'
',
'      EASYRSA_BIN="$(command -v easyrsa || true)"
',
'      [[ -z "$EASYRSA_BIN" ]] && EASYRSA_BIN="/usr/share/easy-rsa/easyrsa"
',
'
',
'      INT="/opt/ca-lab/pki/intermediate"
',
'      OUT="/opt/ca-lab/issued"
',
'
',
'      NAME="$1"; TYPE="$2"; DAYS="$3"; SANS="$4"
',
'
',
'      cd "$INT"
',
'      export EASYRSA_BATCH=1
',
'      export EASYRSA_CERT_EXPIRE="$DAYS"
',
'
',
'      "$EASYRSA_BIN" gen-req "$NAME" nopass
',
'      EASYRSA_EXTRA_EXTS="subjectAltName=$SANS" "$EASYRSA_BIN" sign-req "$TYPE" "$NAME"
',
'
',
'      mkdir -p "$OUT/$NAME"
',
'      cp "$INT/pki/private/$NAME.key" "$OUT/$NAME/"
',
'      cp "$INT/pki/issued/$NAME.crt" "$OUT/$NAME/"
',
'      cp "$INT/pki/ca-chain.crt" "$OUT/$NAME/"
',
'      cat "$OUT/$NAME/$NAME.crt" "$OUT/$NAME/ca-chain.crt" > "$OUT/$NAME/fullchain.pem"
',
'
',
'      cd "$OUT" && zip -qr "$NAME.zip" "$NAME"
',
'
',
'      echo OK
',
'
',
'runcmd:
',
'  - mkdir -p /opt/ca-lab/{scripts,pki,issued,app}
',
'  - chown -R $(getent passwd 1000 | cut -d: -f1):$(getent passwd 1000 | cut -d: -f1) /opt/ca-lab
',
'  - wget https://packages.microsoft.com/config/ubuntu/22.04/packages-microsoft-prod.deb -O /tmp/ms.deb
',
'  - dpkg -i /tmp/ms.deb
',
'  - apt update
',
'  - apt install -y dotnet-sdk-8.0
',
'  - sudo -u $(getent passwd 1000 | cut -d: -f1) dotnet new web -n ca-web -o /opt/ca-lab/app/ca-web --force
',
'  - sudo -u $(getent passwd 1000 | cut -d: -f1) dotnet publish /opt/ca-lab/app/ca-web -c Release -o /opt/ca-lab/app/ca-web/publish
',
'  - a2enmod proxy proxy_http rewrite
',
'  - systemctl restart apache2
'
))]
